attributes.action: Change child benefits, cost of childcare, maternity or paternity leave period
attributes.additional_details: Chaining this to allowing one year of paid paternal or maternity leave will help parents raise new children. We are requesting these changes to actual laws to help children that are in poverty, creating for them a healthier and happier start in life
attributes.background: The right to take a year off for paternity or maternity leave. Child benefits should be increased by at least £20 per month per child to enable families to maintain a decent standard of living. We propose 30 hours of free childcare to all families through an entirely funded program.

rejection.details:
There are petitions we have open which already cover the topics you have raised, which you might like to sign.

Increase flat rate of Child Maintenance to £21.15 p/w
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598757

Extend Maternity / Shared Parental Leave from 12 months to 15 months
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598408

Fund free childcare for working parents with children over 9 months
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602132
